uri.name: Active Virtual Machines by OS (BR18)
uri.description: The report contains comparative measurements number of running virtual machines and OS usage in for a selected cluster and a selected virtual machine's type within the requested period.

uri.name: Cluster Capactity Vs Usage (BR19)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying host's resources usage measurements (CPU core; physical Memory) and charts displaying virtual machine's resources usage measurements (virtual machine's total vCPU; Virtual Memory size) for a selected cluster.

uri.name: Host OS Break Down (BR22)
uri.description: This report contains a table and a chart displaying the number of hosts for each OS version for a selected cluster within a requested period.

uri.name: Summary of Host Usage Resources (BR17)
uri.description: The report contains a scattered chart of CPU and memory usage data within a requested period and for a selected cluster.

uri.name: Hosts Inventory (BR1)
uri.description: This report displays a list of all hosts of the selected data center and cluster.

uri.name: Virtual Machines Inventory (BR9)
uri.description: This report displays a list of all virtual machines of the selected data center and cluster.

uri.name: Cluster Host Uptime (BR7)
uri.description: This report contains chart displaying the weighted average uptime of hosts within a selected cluster for a requested period and a table of history data displaying the down time and the maintenance time each time of each host.

uri.name: High Availability Virtual Servers Uptime (BR14)
uri.description: This report contains one gauge displaying the weighted average uptime of high availability virtual servers within a selected cluster for a requested period and a table of history data displaying the total down time (in hours) of each virtual machine.

uri.name: Cluster Quality of Service - Hosts (BR6)
uri.description: This report contains a chart displaying the time hosts have performed above a selected threshold (Host-hours) and a table of total time each host was performing above the CPU or the Memory threshold.

uri.name: Cluster Quality of Service - Virtual Machines (BR13)
uri.description: This report contains a chart displaying the time virtual machines have performed above a selected threshold and a table of total time each virtual machine was performing above the CPU or the memory threshold.

uri.name: Top 10 Downtime Hosts (BR7B)
uri.description: This report contains a chart displaying the uptime, maintenance time and the down time for the bottom 10 hosts sorted by weighted uptime.

uri.name: Five Most Utilized Hosts (Over Time) (BR4)
uri.description: This report contains two charts displaying weighted average daily peak of CPU and memory usage for the top five busiest hosts of a selected cluster and within a given period.

uri.name: Five Most Utilized Virtual Machines (Over Time) (BR11)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying weighted average daily peak of CPU and memory usage for the top five busiest virtual machines of a selected cluster and within a given period month.

uri.name: Five Least Utilized Hosts (Over Time) (BR5)
uri.description: This report contains two charts displaying weighted average daily peak of CPU and memory usage for the bottom five busiest hosts of a selected cluster and within a given period.

uri.name: Five Least Utilized Virtual Machines (Over Time) (BR12)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying weighted average daily peak of CPU and memory usage for the bottom five busiest virtual machines of a selected cluster and within a given period month.

uri.name: Storage Domain Size Over Time (BR21)
uri.description: This report displays daily used disk size versus available disk size data for the selected datacenter and storage domain within a requested period.

uri.name: Active Virtual Machines by OS (BR18)
uri.description: The report contains comparative measurements number of running virtual machines and OS usage in for a selected cluster and a selected virtual machine's type within the requested period.

uri.name: Cluster Capactity Vs Usage (BR19)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying host's resources usage measurements (CPU core; physical Memory) and charts displaying virtual machine's resources usage measurements (virtual machine's total vCPU; Virtual Memory size) for a selected cluster.

uri.name: Host OS Break Down (BR22)
uri.description: This report contains a table and a chart displaying the number of hosts for each OS version for a selected cluster within a requested period.

uri.name: Summary of Host Usage Resources (BR17)
uri.description: The report contains a scattered chart of CPU and memory usage data within a requested period and for a selected cluster.

uri.name: Hosts Inventory (BR1)
uri.description: This report displays a list of all hosts of the selected data center and cluster.

uri.name: Virtual Machines Inventory (BR9)
uri.description: This report displays a list of all virtual machines of the selected data center and cluster.

uri.name: Cluster Host Uptime (BR7)
uri.description: This report contains chart displaying the weighted average uptime of hosts within a selected cluster for a requested period and a table of history data displaying the down time and the maintenance time each time of each host.

uri.name: High Availability Virtual Servers Uptime (BR14)
uri.description: This report contains one gauge displaying the weighted average uptime of high availability virtual servers within a selected cluster for a requested period and a table of history data displaying the total down time (in hours) of each virtual machine.

uri.name: Cluster Quality of Service - Hosts (BR6)
uri.description: This report contains a chart displaying the time hosts have performed above a selected threshold (Host-hours) and a table of total time each host was performing above the CPU or the Memory threshold.

uri.name: Cluster Quality of Service - Virtual Machines (BR13)
uri.description: This report contains a chart displaying the time virtual machines have performed above a selected threshold and a table of total time each virtual machine was performing above the CPU or the memory threshold.

uri.name: Top 10 Downtime Hosts (BR7B)
uri.description: This report contains a chart displaying the uptime, maintenance time and the down time for the bottom 10 hosts sorted by weighted uptime.

uri.name: Five Most Utilized Hosts (Over Time) (BR4)
uri.description: This report contains two charts displaying weighted average daily peak of CPU and memory usage for the top five busiest hosts of a selected cluster and within a given period.

uri.name: Five Most Utilized Virtual Machines (Over Time) (BR11)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying weighted average daily peak of CPU and memory usage for the top five busiest virtual machines of a selected cluster and within a given period month.

uri.name: Five Least Utilized Hosts (Over Time) (BR5)
uri.description: This report contains two charts displaying weighted average daily peak of CPU and memory usage for the bottom five busiest hosts of a selected cluster and within a given period.

uri.name: Five Least Utilized Virtual Machines (Over Time) (BR12)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying weighted average daily peak of CPU and memory usage for the bottom five busiest virtual machines of a selected cluster and within a given period month.

uri.name: Single Host Uptime (BR8)
uri.description: This report contains one gauge displaying the weighted average uptime of a single selected host for a requested period.

uri.name: Single Host Resource Usage (Over Time) (BR2A)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying resources usage measurements (Number of Virtual Machines, CPU, Memory, Network Tx/Rx) for a selected host over the selected period.

uri.name: Single Host Resource Usage (Days of Week) (BR2B)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying resources usage measurements (Number of Virtual Machines, CPU, Memory, Network Tx/Rx) for a selected host by the days of the week.

uri.name: Single Host Resource Usage (Hour of Day) (BR2C)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying resources usage measurements (Number of Virtual Machines, CPU, Memory, Network Tx/Rx) for a selected host by hours of day.

uri.name: Multiple Hosts Resource Usage (Over Time) (BR3)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying daily peak of CPU and memory usage for up to 5 selected hosts within a requested period.

uri.name: Single Virtual Machine Resources (Over Time) (BR10A)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying resources usage measurements (CPU, Memory, Network Tx/Rx, Disk IO rates) for a selected virtual machine over the selected time.

uri.name: Single Virtual Machine Resources (Days of Week) (BR10B)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying resources usage measurements (CPU, Memory, Network Tx/Rx, Disk IO rates) for a selected virtual machine by days of week.

uri.name: Single Virtual Machine Resources (Hour of Day) (BR10C)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying resources usage measurements (CPU, Memory, Network Tx/Rx, Disk IO rates) for a selected virtual machine by hours of day.

uri.name: Multiple Virtual Machines Resource Usage (Over Time) (BR16)
uri.description: This report contains charts displaying daily peak of CPU and Memory usage for up to 5 selected virtual machines within a requested period.
